about shoxruh barber:
Shoxruh
BARBER
My name is Shoxrux. I am 27 years old. I am currently working as a Barber. Before entering this field, I worked in various fields, but I could not see my future in other types of professions. I found my place in the barber profession and could see my future. My entry into this industry was accidental: I learned by combing and cutting the hair of servicemen during my military service, and I became interested in this sphere. I started working despite not having enough experience in this field, and as a result of my strong interest and constant work on myself, I became a skilled barber at the current level.
about sirojiddin barber:
Sirojiddin
BARBER
My name is Sirojiddin, started entering this field when I was 16 years old. In the beginning, I started learning by apprenticing to a good teacher, and at that time I had no interest in this profession, but as time went by, my interest grew and it became my favorite job. My uncle is the main reason why I entered this field.
tarif: ONE Barbershop - This is a place where they will help you find your own, unique style. You should trust the masters of Tita once, and, believe me, the new image will not leave you warm-hearted. Men's haircuts and close shaving are our specialty, and we are confident that our barbers do it the best. As the famous Ralph Lauren once said: “No matter what lifestyle you lead, you must have your own style, your own world.” Of course, we won’t promise that we will make Cary Grant out of you, but you can be sure of 3 things:
choy kofe: YOU WILL BE SURE TO BE PRESENTED WITH A CUP OF FLAVORED COFFEE OR TEA
yevropa an'analari: WE WILL CUT AND SHAVE YOU AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL ACCORDING TO ALL EUROPEAN TRADITIONS
qayta kelishni xohlaysiz: BEFORE YOU KNOW IT, YOU WILL WANT TO COME BACK TO OUR BARBERSHOP.
10 yoshgacha bo'lgan bolalarning soch tu: Children's haircut up to 10 years old
